TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VirtualPathUtility extends System.Object
public ref class VirtualPathUtility abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供虛擬路徑一般作業的公用程式方法。

span.span: Provides utility methods for common virtual path operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供公用程式方法牽涉到的虛擬路徑的一般作業。The class provides utility methods for common operations involving virtual paths. ASP.NET 伺服器控制項和伺服器程式碼，為虛擬路徑使用 Web 應用程式根目錄運算子，波狀符號 （~），通常會用於而非相對與絕對路徑。For ASP.NET server controls and server code, virtual paths using the Web application root operator, the tilde (~), commonly are used instead of relative and absolute paths. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web 專案路徑](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Project Paths](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd). 使用類別時，您需要將應用程式相對路徑轉換成絕對虛擬路徑，因為可能會在開發自訂的 Web 服務處理常式。Use the class when you need to convert application-relative paths to absolute virtual paths, as might be the case in developing a custom Web service handler. 絕對虛擬路徑的開頭常值的斜線 （/）。An absolute virtual path starts with the literal slash mark (/). 相對的虛擬路徑是相對於應用程式的根目錄，如果它是只波狀符號 （~） 或開頭為波狀符號和使用雙反斜線 (~\\\\) 或波狀符號和斜線符號 (~ /)。A relative virtual path is relative to the application root directory, if it is just a tilde (~) or starts with the tilde and a double backslash (~\\\\) or the tilde and a slash mark (~/). 進行相對虛擬路徑會使路徑的獨立應用程式。Making a virtual path relative makes the path independent of the application. 虛擬目錄的應用程式可從取得和屬性。The virtual directory for the application can be obtained from the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 類別不提供安全性或標準化的用途。The class is not intended for security or canonicalization purposes. 如需 Web 應用程式安全性的詳細資訊，請參閱[概觀的 Web 應用程式的安全性威脅](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a)。For more information about Web application security, see [Overview of Web Application Security Threats](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a). 如需一般 URL 處理功能，請參閱。For generic URL processing functionality, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別和其方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class and some of its methods. 首先，屬性會產生網頁上的虛擬路徑。First, the property generates the virtual path to the Web page. ， ，和方法會傳回虛擬路徑的相關資訊。The , , and methods return information about the virtual path. 下一步屬性會產生目前的要求可能會從不同的虛擬路徑屬性，如果呼叫方法。Next, the property generates a virtual path of the current request, which might be different from the property, if a method was called. ， ，和方法會傳回虛擬路徑的相關資訊。The , , and methods return information about the virtual path. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/cs/virtualpathutilitycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/vb/virtualpathutilityvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 將常值斜線符號 (/) 附加至虛擬路徑結尾 (如果沒有的話)。

span.span: Appends the literal slash mark (/) to the end of the virtual path, if one does not already exist.
The modified virtual path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果常值的斜線 （/） 存在於虛擬路徑的結尾，就不會修改的虛擬路徑。If the literal slash mark (/) exists at the end of the virtual path, the virtual path is not modified.

The relative path.

summary.span: 結合基底路徑和相對路徑。

span.span: Combines a base path and a relative path.
The combined and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的值相對路徑是否完全波狀符號 （~） 的屬性。The method returns the value of the property if the relative path is exactly a tilde (~). 方法會使用屬性值而不是基底路徑、 相對路徑的開頭波狀符號和斜線符號 (~ /)，否則方法會使用基底路徑。The method uses the property value rather than the base path, if the relative path starts with a tilde and a slash mark (~/); otherwise, the method uses the base path.

span.span: is a physical path.
-or-
includes one or more colons.
is or an empty string.
-or-
is or an empty string.

Public Shared Function GetDirectory (virtualPath As String) As String

span.span: The virtual path.

summary.span: 傳回虛擬路徑的目錄部分。

span.span: Returns the directory portion of a virtual path.

returns.span: 虛擬路徑中參考的目錄。

span.span: The directory referenced in the virtual path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`virtualPath`不根目錄; 也就是不等於根目錄運算子 （波狀符號 [~]）、 開頭不波狀符號 （~），例如波狀符號和斜線符號 (~ /) 或波狀符號和使用雙反斜線 (~ / /)，或並非以斜線 （/）、 開頭例外狀況 就會擲回。If `virtualPath` is not rooted; that is, it does not equal the root operator (the tilde [~]), does not start with a tilde (~), such as a tilde and a slash mark (~/) or a tilde and a double backslash (~//), or does not start with a slash mark (/), an exception is thrown. 如果傳入的虛擬路徑方法`"/images/image1.gif"`，傳回的目錄是`"/images"`。If the virtual path that is passed into the method is `"/images/image1.gif"`, the returned directory is `"/images"`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ，和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/cs/virtualpathutilitycs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/vb/virtualpathutilityvb.aspx#2)]

span.span: is not rooted.
\- or -
is or an empty string.

span.span: if is relative to the application; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虛擬路徑可以是只根目錄運算子 （波狀符號 [~]），或其開頭根目錄運算子。The virtual path can be just the root operator (the tilde [~]), or it can begin with the root operator. 如果`virtualPath`是`null`、引發例外狀況。If `virtualPath` is `null`, an exception is raised. 如果`virtualPath`為空字串 ("")，則方法會傳回`false`。If `virtualPath` is an empty string (""), the method returns `false`. > [!NOTE] > `"~` `filename` `"` 不是有效的虛擬路徑，並傳回`false`如方法。`"~` `filename` `"` is not a valid virtual path and returns `false` for the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ，和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/cs/virtualpathutilitycs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/vb/virtualpathutilityvb.aspx#3)]

span.span: is .

public: static System::String ^ MakeRelative(System::String ^ fromPath, System::String ^ toPath);

param.name: fromPath
param.span: 傳回相對虛擬路徑的起始虛擬路徑。

span.span: The starting virtual path to return the relative virtual path from.

param.name: toPath
param.span: 傳回相對虛擬路徑的結束虛擬路徑。

span.span: The ending virtual path to return the relative virtual path to.

summary.span: 傳回從某個包含根目錄運算子 (波狀符號 [~]) 之虛擬路徑到另一個虛擬路徑的相對虛擬路徑。

span.span: Returns the relative virtual path from one virtual path containing the root operator (the tilde [~]) to another.

returns.span: 從 到 的相對虛擬路徑。

span.span: The relative virtual path from to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromPath`和`toPath`參數不根項目; 也就是說，不等於根目錄運算子 （波狀符號 [~]），不會啟動波狀符號 （~），例如波狀符號和斜線符號 (~ /) 或波狀符號和使用雙反斜線 (~ / /)，或不會啟動斜線符號 （/）、擲回例外狀況。If the `fromPath` and `toPath` parameters are not rooted; that is, they do not equal the root operator (the tilde [~]), do not start with a tilde (~), such as a tilde and a slash mark (~/) or a tilde and a double backslash (~//), or do not start with a slash mark (/), an exception is thrown. 查詢字串參數和 URI 中所使用的 HTML 錨點不會用於決定的相對路徑。Query string parameters and HTML anchors that are used in the URI are not used in determining the relative path. 如果`fromPath`是`"/directory1/file1.aspx"`和`toPath`是`"/directory2/file2.aspx"`、方法會傳回`"../directory2/file2.aspx"`。If `fromPath` is `"/directory1/file1.aspx"` and `toPath` is `"/directory2/file2.aspx"`, the method returns `"../directory2/file2.aspx"`.

span.span: is not rooted.
\- or -
is not rooted.

.method public static hidebysig string RemoveTrailingSlash(string virtualPath) cil managed

public: static System::String ^ RemoveTrailingSlash(System::String ^ virtualPath);

param.name: virtualPath
param.span: 要移除任何尾端斜線符號的虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path to remove any trailing slash mark from.

summary.span: 從虛擬路徑移除尾端斜線符號 (/)。

span.span: Removes a trailing slash mark (/) from a virtual path.

returns.span: 如果虛擬路徑不是根目錄 ("/")，則為不含尾端斜線符號的虛擬路徑，否則為 。

span.span: A virtual path without a trailing slash mark, if the virtual path is not already the root directory ("/"); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除虛擬路徑的結尾斜線 （/）。The method removes a slash mark (/) from the end of the virtual path. 如果虛擬路徑的根目錄 (`"/"`)，會採取任何動作。If the virtual path is already the root directory (`"/"`), no action is taken. 如果虛擬路徑`null`或空字串 ("")，則方法會傳回`null`。If the virtual path is `null` or an empty string (""), the method returns `null`.

summary.span: 將虛擬路徑轉換成應用程式絕對路徑。

span.span: Converts a virtual path to an application absolute path.

.method public static hidebysig string ToAbsolute(string virtualPath) cil managed
Public Shared Function ToAbsolute (virtualPath As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ ToAbsolute(System::String ^ virtualPath);

param.name: virtualPath
param.span: 要轉換成相對應用程式路徑的虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path to convert to an application-relative path.

summary.span: 將虛擬路徑轉換成應用程式絕對路徑。

span.span: Converts a virtual path to an application absolute path.

returns.span: 指定之虛擬路徑的絕對路徑表示。

span.span: The absolute path representation of the specified virtual path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式絕對路徑會是一個應用程式路徑用而不是根目錄運算子 （波狀符號 [~]） 的位置。An application absolute path is one where the application path is used instead of the root operator (the tilde [~]). 如果`virtualPath`是：If `virtualPath` is: - 絕對方法會傳回虛擬路徑不變。Absolute, the method returns the virtual path unchanged. - 應用程式相對方法會將目前的應用程式虛擬目錄路徑附加到開頭`virtualPath`。Application relative, the method appends the current application virtual directory path to the beginning of the `virtualPath`. 例如，從可以存取目前的應用程式虛擬目錄路徑屬性。For example, the current application virtual directory path can be accessed from the property. - 不進行 root 破解，方法會引發例外狀況。Not rooted, the method raises an exception.

span.span: is not rooted.

exception.span: 使用前置雙重句號 (..) 回到上層目錄。

span.span: A leading double period (..) is used to exit above the top directory.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string ToAbsolute (string virtualPath, string applicationPath);
.method public static hidebysig string ToAbsolute(string virtualPath, string applicationPath) cil managed
Public Shared Function ToAbsolute (virtualPath As String, applicationPath As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ ToAbsolute(System::String ^ virtualPath, System::String ^ applicationPath);

param.name: virtualPath
param.span: 要轉換成相對應用程式路徑的虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path to convert to an application-relative path.

param.name: applicationPath
param.span: 用來將 virtualPath 轉換成相對路徑的應用程式路徑。

span.span: The application path to use to convert virtualPath to a relative path.

summary.span: 使用指定的應用程式路徑，將虛擬路徑轉換成應用程式絕對路徑。

span.span: Converts a virtual path to an application absolute path using the specified application path.
The absolute virtual path representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多載方法會使用提供的應用程式路徑，而不是目前的應用程式路徑。The overload of the method uses the supplied application path rather than the current application path. 如果`virtualPath`是：If `virtualPath` is: - 絕對方法傳回未變更的虛擬路徑。Absolute, the method returns the virtual path with no changes. - 應用程式相對方法會將`applicationPath`的虛擬路徑的開頭。Application relative, the method adds `applicationPath` to the beginning of the virtual path. - 不進行 root 破解，方法會引發例外狀況。Not rooted, the method raises an exception.

span.span: is not rooted.

exception.span: 在應用程式路徑中，使用前置雙重句號 (..) 回到上層目錄。

span.span: A leading double period (..) is used in the application path to exit above the top directory.

summary.span: 將虛擬路徑轉換成相對應用程式路徑。

span.span: Converts a virtual path into an application-relative path.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string ToAppRelative (string virtualPath);
.method public static hidebysig string ToAppRelative(string virtualPath) cil managed
Public Shared Function ToAppRelative (virtualPath As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ ToAppRelative(System::String ^ virtualPath);

param.name: virtualPath
param.span: 要轉換成相對應用程式路徑的虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path to convert to an application-relative path.

summary.span: 使用 屬性中的應用程式虛擬路徑，將虛擬路徑轉換成相對應用程式路徑。

span.span: Converts a virtual path to an application-relative path using the application virtual path that is in the property.

returns.span: 的相對應用程式路徑表示。

span.span: The application-relative path representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果應用程式的虛擬路徑是`"myapp"`和虛擬路徑`"/myApp/sub/default.asp"`傳入方法，產生的應用程式的相對路徑會是`"~/sub/default.aspx"`。If the virtual path for the application is `"myapp"` and the virtual path `"/myApp/sub/default.asp"` is passed into the method, the resulting application-relative path is `"~/sub/default.aspx"`. 如果`virtualPath`不是以目前的應用程式路徑，開頭方法會傳回虛擬路徑不變。If `virtualPath` does not start with the current application path, the method returns the virtual path unchanged. 如果`virtualPath`等同於應用程式路徑，根目錄運算子 （波狀符號 [~]），則會傳回。If `virtualPath` is the same as the application path, the root operator (the tilde [~]), is returned. 例如，從可以存取目前的應用程式虛擬目錄路徑屬性。For example, the current application virtual directory path can be accessed from the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ，和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/cs/virtualpathutilitycs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/vb/virtualpathutilityvb.aspx#3)]

span.span: is .

param.span: 用來將 virtualPath 轉換成相對路徑的應用程式路徑。

span.span: The application path to use to convert virtualPath to a relative path.

summary.span: 使用指定的應用程式路徑，將虛擬路徑轉換成相對應用程式路徑。

span.span: Converts a virtual path to an application-relative path using a specified application path.

returns.span: 的相對應用程式路徑表示。

span.span: The application-relative path representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多載方法會使用`applicationPath`而不是目前的應用程式路徑。The overload of the method uses `applicationPath` rather than the current application path. 如果`virtualPath`開頭不`applicationPath`、方法會傳回虛擬路徑不變。If `virtualPath` does not start with `applicationPath`, the method returns the virtual path unchanged.
